info.author: Erwan Briand
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Bluemindo is a really simple but powerful audio player in Python/PyGTK, using
Gstreamer. It's a free (as in freedom) software, released under GPLv3, only.

It can downloads albums or artists pictures and lyrics as doing desktop
notifications or sending music to your Last.fm/Libre.fm profile or on your
Jabber account
(via PEP).
Also, you can choose the view mode you want: lightweight, basic, normal, full or
albums.
info.keywords: audio mp3 ogg flac gtk player music
info.name: Bluemindo
info.summary: Simple yet powerful audio player in Python/PyGTK, using Gstreamer.
info.html_description:
Bluemindo is a really simple but powerful audio player in Python/PyGTK, using Gstreamer. It’s a free (as in freedom) software, released under GPLv3, only.

It can downloads albums or artists pictures and lyrics as doing desktop notifications or sending music to your Last.fm/Libre.fm profile or on your Jabber account (via PEP). Also, you can choose the view mode you want: lightweight, basic, normal, full or albums.
